In early 2015, Aphex Twin began uploading rare and unreleased music to an anonymous Soundcloud account. By late October he had uploaded 261 tracks, and a fan voting site had appeared to help Aphex Twin himself decide which tracks should get remastered and released traditionally. Plotting fan votes against Soundcloud plays gives us a new visual means to explore the archive.

Data: Soundcloud/user18081971.watmm.com/Echonest.

Designed & built by @tomlongmate with D3/D3 Cartogram and more.
